video.title: Narcos: Mexico
video.synopsis: Witness the birth of the Mexican drug war in the 1980s as a gritty new "Narcos" saga chronicles the true story of the Guadalajara cartel's ascent.

episodes.synopsis: When the army pillages ​Sinaloa, ​an ambitious pot farmer pitches a plan to build a drug empire in Guadalajara. A young DEA agent transfers to Mexico.
episodes.title: Camelot

episodes.synopsis: Félix tries to unite all of the plazas while Rafa searches for water for his seedless weed. Police corruption and the DEA’s complacency frustrate Kiki.
episodes.title: The Plaza System

episodes.synopsis: Kiki flies solo on a risky undercover operation. Félix turns to his mentor for advice as conflict between the cops and the traffickers escalates.
episodes.title: El Padrino

episodes.synopsis: After months of frustration, Kiki seizes an opportunity. Rafa runs afoul of powerful government officials, putting Félix in a difficult position.
episodes.title: Rafa, Rafa, Rafa!

episodes.synopsis: A threat leaves Mika shaken. Félix envisions a different kind of future for the Guadalajara cartel.
episodes.title: The Colombian Connection

episodes.synopsis: A violent power struggle erupts between Falcón and Rafa. As Félix finds a footing in the cocaine business, the DEA tries to lure him into the U.S.
episodes.title: La Última Frontera

episodes.synopsis: María implores Félix to move back to Sinaloa. Kiki gathers evidence of the Guadalajara cartel’s pot fields. Neto mourns.
episodes.title: Jefe de Jefes

episodes.synopsis: After the DEA closes in on Rafa's enormous pot field, Félix tries to stop his associates from retaliating. Kiki and Jaime meet with investigators.
episodes.title: Just Say No

episodes.synopsis: A desperate Jaime is stymied by bureaucratic paperwork. Mika worries about her husband. Félix urges Rafa to disappear.
episodes.title: 881 Lope de Vega

episodes.synopsis: As pressure mounts, Félix returns to Sinaloa. An enraged Jaime and Mika seek justice and answers.
episodes.title: Leyenda

episodes.synopsis: While celebrating his 40th birthday, Félix worries about his associates' loyalty and confronts Pacho. Walt and his team plan retaliatory kidnappings.
episodes.title: Salva El Tigre

episodes.synopsis: Verdin taunts the DEA agents torturing him. Félix offers opium dealer Guerra a partnership deal. Benjamín's sister Enedina poses a new business idea.
episodes.title: Alea lacta Est

episodes.synopsis: Multiple advisers counsel Félix to go into hiding as the Americans close in on the men involved in Kiki's murder. Amado helps Acosta resolve a feud.
episodes.title: Ruben Zuno Arce

episodes.synopsis: Zuno testifies in front of a grand jury. Isabella tries to broker a deal with Enedina. Félix makes a daring offer to a U.S. contact.
episodes.title: The Big Dig

episodes.synopsis: Calderoni briefs Walt on the tension between the plazas as Chapo continues construction of his tunnel. Félix's meeting with Pacho takes a turn.
episodes.title: AFO

episodes.synopsis: Félix meets with a political leader. Benjamín takes a stand when the Sinaloa and Tijuana rivalry intensifies. Walt's team turns its attention to planes.
episodes.title: El Dedazo

episodes.synopsis: Félix proposes a new plan to help the PRI win the election and defeat Cárdenas. Promised intel on Félix, Walt takes an unexpected meeting in Ojinaga.
episodes.title: Truth and Reconciliation

episodes.synopsis: Mexican authorities, the FBI and Félix all seek out Acosta after a newspaper publishes an interview with him. The presidential election begins.
episodes.title: Se Cayó El Sistema

episodes.synopsis: Félix stakes the future of his entire cartel on the delivery of 70 tons of cocaine as Walt and the DEA plan to topple the kingpin's empire.
episodes.title: Growth, Prosperity, and Liberation

episodes.synopsis: After meeting with Pacho, Félix presents the plaza bosses with a new business plan. Walt receives a surprising invitation.
episodes.title: Free Trade

episodes.synopsis: Walt's undercover mission takes a turn. Amado is released following three months in prison. Juárez police officer Victor looks for a missing girl.
episodes.title: 12 Steps

episodes.synopsis: Tijuana journalist Andréa takes an interest in the teen guests at the wedding between Enedina Arellano and a prominent attorney. Walt considers a move.
episodes.title: Como La Flor

episodes.synopsis: After a disappointing conversation with the Arellanos about purchasing land, the Sinaloa cartel reacts. Andréa continues investigating the narcojuniors.
episodes.title: Los Juniors

episodes.synopsis: With the Tijuana and Sinaloa cartels at war, everyone wonders where Juárez stands, but Amado has other plans in Cuba. Ramón seeks revenge against Chapo.
episodes.title: GDL

episodes.synopsis: Walt joins a Mexican task force led by Gen. Rebollo aimed at catching those responsible for the Guadalajara massacre and Cardinal Posada's death.
episodes.title: Boots on the Ground

episodes.synopsis: Victor is shaken by a murder and takes action. Violence escalates in Tijuana. New boss Enedina develops a plan to challenge her cartel's rivals.
episodes.title: La Jefa

episodes.synopsis: La Voz is targeted following its reporting on Colosio's assassins. Mayo and Chapo form an alliance against the Tijuana cartel. Victor asks questions.
episodes.title: La Voz

episodes.synopsis: When torturing Alex doesn't work, Walt switches tactics. Andrea sifts through financial records tied to Hank and the PRI. Amado plans for the future.
episodes.title: Last Dance

episodes.synopsis: Andrea uncovers a startling connection, instigating a cascade of events. With Alex's help, Walt closes in on Benjamín. Hank threatens Amado.
episodes.title: The Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: Mexican and US authorities search in earnest for Amado. While in prison, Chapo makes moves to show he's the boss. Enedina sends Ramón on a mission.
episodes.title: Life in Wartime
